channel.title: Help hosting server on itouch
channel.description:
Hey,
I am aware of the apps you need to get off cydia for you to be able to run a server on your itouch, but the cydia that i have doesnt have the apps that you need to get. Where do i get the cydia, and how do i install it on my ipod so that i can get the apps like CLASSPATH etc for me to host the server.
I got the cydia from jailbreakme.com
Thanks.
